column1: Annie could but wonder of what use a pipe would be
column2: but she had been taught to be patient and wait until things were explained to her; so she stood very quiet
column3: and soon saw the fairy in yellow come floating down to the earth. Behind her came another little creature all in red
column4: and still behind her a third in a beautiful blue dress. Between them they carried a long pipe
column7: smoked; and when they were in front of the little girl they began to blow through it very hard
column8: and Annie soon found herself inside a large soap-bubble
column9: and felt that she was gently floating upward in her fairy balloon. When she reached the castle she touched the thin wall with her fingers and it melted away
column10: and left her standing in Fairy Land!
